definitions.definition: Something said or done for amusement, not in seriousness.
The root cause or main issue, especially an unexpected one
A laughably worthless thing or person; a sham.
To do or say something for amusement rather than seriously.
definitions.example: I didn’t mean what I said — I was only joking.

definitions.definition: (intransitive, followed by with) To dupe in a friendly manner for amusement; to mess with, play with.
definitions.example: Relax, man, I'm just joking with you.

definitions.definition: To make merry with; to make jokes upon; to rally.
